text: @dclarke1984 @Niall_Boylan You are absolutely correct.. there is no proof its dangerous or safe. The lack of safety testing concerns me.. I know we all have mobile phones, wifi routers, microwaves and several other devices that transmit some kind of radio waves but 5G is at least 10 times the strength.
